name: SEASONS CRETINS
description: What a perfect segway to our next band name of a band that never banded, SEASONS CRETINS. But you know what? Building on the absolute idiocracy happening in America right around this time in history, I looked forward to the future; towards the holidays. I had a feeling that the holidays would result in a horror show of death. There comes a time when a survivor’s lie, becomes a white lie, becomes a minor lie, becomes a saving face lie, becomes the I can't fail lie, becomes the I must win lie, becomes the I will protect you lie, becomes the I will hurt you lie, becomes my life is a lie, becomes the keeping the justice lie, becomes SHEER MADNESS. We are already way past almost all of these already. Where the fuck do you go from here? It's like America is 2 completely separate countries: one that respects science, medicine, math, you know stuff that reality is made of annnnnd one that is heading for a cliff led by the Republican Party and it's Commander-in-Beef, Donald J. Trump. So Seasons Cretins to you folks that support 'THE BIG LIE'.
